message:
Hah, oh man, I'd almost forgotten about when vertex T&L was the next big thing.

Thanks, Mr_V, awesome read.
Oooh, nice find! Busy reading while I'm sitting in a telecon.
The BEST time to read arbitrary shit on the internet!
And I didn't let that time go to waste. I remember saving up to get a Geforce 256 back in the day.
We had a Voodoo 2 (Fact: The best 3D card *ever*) so we kinda skipped over the early Nvidia releases. Heck if I didn't want a Riva TNT2 though.
I never had the Voodoo cards, but my friend had, and I was so jealous. After the Geforce card, I had a few Matrox cards.
Yeah, stuck with 3Dfx up to the point where it was clear they were *actually* dying.
Nobody needs 32-bit colour, don't be silly!
@MrGenuchi haha, yeah, i remember even the voodoo 3 3000 I had could only do 16bit. But damn, Quake 2 ran soooo well. ;)
